nodes.text: Star Wars: Command Post is the name shared by a number of Star Wars-themed attractions from Disney. The first is located in Hong Kong Disneyland and is a "meet & greet" that allows guests to meet and interact with Star Wars characters.

The Disney Cruise Line's ship Disney Fantasy includes a Star Wars: Command Post as part of their child-aimed area known as Disney Oceaneer Club. That version includes a number of electronic games, activities, and interactions with characters.
